text: Joshua James Atwill "Josh" Pais (born June 21, 1958) is an American actor in movies and television. ==Filmography== * A Beautiful Mind * Phone Booth * That Awkward Moment *Scream 3 ==Personal life== Pais married actress Lisa Emery on August 27, 1990; actor Zane Pais is their son. They divorced in 2003. Pais is married to Marie Forleo. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Josh Pais
